title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.8 - Facilities for cleaning and sanitizing milk trucks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.8 - Facilities for cleaning and sanitizing milk trucks

State Regulations

Facilities for cleaning and sanitizing milk tank trucks
shall comply with the following sections of this Part: 3.9 (Item 1p) 3.19 (Item 11p)
3.12 (Item 4p) 3.20 (Item 12p)
3.14 (Item 6p) 3.22 (Item 14p)
3.15 (Item 7p) 3.23 (Item 15p)
3.16 (Item 8p) 3.28 (Item 17p)
3.17 (Item 9p) 3.30 (Item 19p)
3.18 (Item 10p)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
3.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
